file_content.text: What are you doing here? You have to get to the bridge, now!
We'll keep the Imperials busy! You just get that bridge open!
Hah! Victory! We've done it, men, we've done it! The ship is saved!
I'm sorry, Commander, but that... that isn't the case.
We defeated the entire boarding party--nobody could've slipped past us.
What are you talking about?
No, you're right--it's not you the Imperials slipped past.
That Imperial said that you're the one they were sent to capture.
You're Ambassador Asara?
Listen, that's not important right now--we have a serious problem.
You'd better start telling us what's going on here. Now.
I want an explanation.
First Officer Haken walked us right into a trap. The attack on this air lock was a ruse.
After Haken sent you here, Imperial commandos snuck aboard, they were led by a Mandalorian mercenary called "Ironfist."
We defeated the first group of boarders--there's no reason we can't defeat this group, too.
Then we'll stop them.
Mandalorian mercenary? What are you talking about?
A what called what?
The Mandalorians work for the Empire--they're some of the best warriors in the galaxy. And Ironfist is one of the most famous.
You must be joking.
It gets worse, I'm afraid.
Ironfist and his Imperial commandos stormed the bridge, and now the entire area is locked down tight.
We have to stop the Imperials from gaining control of the ship!
We have to get to the bridge!
That's why I rushed to find you. Something has to be done.
Oh, great.
We have to do something--we have to act fast.
How did you learn about all of this?
You know an awful lot.
I watched the whole thing happen on the security cams.
Look, what is this all about? Why are the Imperials so desperate to capture you?
Because of my work. I'm a Republic ambassador. I travel to Imperial-controlled planets and convince their governments to come over to our side.
Confronting the Empire for the sake of diplomacy takes a lot of courage.
You must be very brave.
I'm no hero. I just show them an alternative to Imperial control.
Turning potential enemies into friends spares us unnecessary conflicts.
A very wise strategy.
Not all battles can be avoided, but diplomacy can gain us so much more than fighting.
You should have identified yourself earlier, ma'am. I could have better ensured your safety.
A Republic official!
I appreciate your concern, but this is no time to play bodyguard. We have bigger problems.
Talk about running dangerous cargo. Who gets you in and out of these places?
Sounds pretty risky.
I slip in on passenger ships like this one and blend in.
But we can talk about my work later.
Let's focus on the ship.
The attack on the ship, everyone who's been killed--it's all because of you!
This is all your fault!
Grand Moff Kilran is the one killing people--not me.
This is no time for casting blame.
We need to retake the bridge. The longer we leave the Imperials in control, the harder it will be to remove them.
I already told you, Ironfist has the bridge locked down. There's no way in or out.
A security lockdown... that is bad. Chief Engineer Salen might know of a workaround.
Hopefully we can get to Salen before the Imperials. Do you know where he is?
We'd better find him fast.
You're the security commander--don't you have the authority to cancel the lockdown?
Can't you unlock the doors?
The bridge lockdown can't be canceled from the outside. No, it's Salen or it's nothing.
You'd better come up with something better than that, Narlock.
That's not much of a plan.
There's no other choice. Only Salen knows the ship's systems well enough to get us past the lockdown.
He and his team will be down in the engineering section. I'm sure they'll be able to help us.
We'll need a diversion. If the Imperials notice the hatches to engineering opening, they'll flood the area with soldiers.
My men and I can handle that. Form up, men! We're going to go start some trouble!
Let's get that bridge open!
I'm ready if you are.
We'll give those Imps something to think about, won't we, boys?
We're supposed to get all the way to engineering without any help?
So we're on our own?
You're the best fighters here. No one else stands a chance of making it to engineering alive.
You expect me to get to engineering all by myself?
So I'm on my own?
You're the best fighter we've got. If anyone can make it to engineering alive, it's you.
This doesn't sound good.
It's a lot to ask of you, I know. But we have to get the bridge open.
I'll go along with Commander Narlock. Once you've cleared a path to engineering, I'll double-back and join up with you there. Good luck.
This is it, men. This is what you've been training for. The Imperials are coming, and we're not going to let them past, are we?
Sir, no, sir!
We won't be fighting alone! We have some very experienced volunteers--the Imps will never know what hit them!
And we aren't fighting alone! An experienced volunteer is going to help us--the Imps won't stand a chance!
My lightsaber is at your service, Commander.
You can count on me.
Do you hear that, men? Our friend here is going to chop through these Imps like nothing!
The Force will guide us to victory.
We can't fail.
The Force will be with us, men! We'll be unstoppable!
Hope you're ready to see a real professional at work.
Watch and learn.
A professional! We've got nothing to worry about, men--we can't lose!
Havoc Squad, reporting for duty!
Ready and able, sir.
Havoc Squad! The best in the Republic, and they're fighting by your side, men. We can't fail! We won't!
Time to get down to business.
Yes! The battle plan!
Let's kill some Imperials!
It's victory or nothing!
The Imps will cut through any second now--we need to take up defensive positions.
We have to defend the ship!
This is it, men. This is what you've been training for. The Imperials are coming, and we're not going to let them past, are we?
Don't give 'em an inch!
It's victory or nothing!
The Imps will cut through any second now--we need to take up defensive positions.
Positions! Move, move!
Move up, men! Get ready!
Surrender, let us take Ambassador Asara, and there will be no need to kill you. You could live long, healthy lives as Imperial slaves!
It's her--the ambassador! Capture her at all costs!
The bridge! You have to hurry, it was all a trap! The Imperials set us up!
